title: Rollback live deployment to Draft 52 (frontend verification + metadata update)

requirements.summary: Ensure the live deployment uses Draft 52 code only, with no functional or UI/UX changes beyond selecting Draft 52 for deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed/live app is built from draft 52 code (not draft 53 or 54).
No intentional functional changes or UI/UX changes are introduced as part of this redeploy (beyond switching the deployed draft).

file_operations.description: Update deployment guidance/checklist to explicitly state that the live build must be produced from Draft 52 source, with verification steps to avoid deploying Draft 53/54 (documentation-only; no app behavior changes).

requirements.summary: Restore Draft-52 default for the Voice Announcements toggle so it is OFF on fresh load and does not inherit Draft-54 default behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh load (new browser session/incognito) of the deployed draft-52 build, the "Voice Announcements" switch renders OFF by default if that is how draft 52 behaved.
The deployed build does not show the draft-54 default (ON) when running the draft-52 deployment.

file_operations.description: Set the default voice settings to match Draft 52 behavior by defaulting voice announcements to disabled on initial load (ensure session-only defaults remain non-persistent).

requirements.summary: Update live release metadata constants to indicate Draft 52 is the currently deployed live version.
acceptanceCriteria: LIVE_VERSION_DATE is updated to the deployment date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

file_operations.description: Update LIVE_VERSION to "Draft 52" and set LIVE_VERSION_DATE to the Draft-52 deployment date (YYYY-MM-DD).
